name: xiaomi motion activated night light 2
description:
3-in-1 smart light for lighting, motion detection and light detection.

Product Features:
• Portable or standalone, Shine extra light wherever you need it
• Innovate magnetic attraction design warm, soft light in the palm of your hand.
• Rotates 360° for diffuse lighting.
• Two adjustable brightness settings* - Low for soft, gentle lighting and High for bright, clear lighting
• Ultra-low power consumption, Works for up to 360 days without charging
• Built-in dual-sensor, 120° wide sensing area
• 2800K warm yellow light, no visible flicker, no harmful blue light, Enhanced eye protection
